title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Gains 3.3% as All Twenty Assets Move Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Chainlink (LINK) rose 9.7% and Polkadot (DOT) gained 6.7%, leading the index higher.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2604.12, up 3.3% (+83.6) since 4 p.m. ET on Thursday.

All 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: LINK (+9.7%) and DOT (+6.7%).

Laggards: BCH (+1.3%) and UNI (+1.9%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index gained 3.3% with all twenty assets trading higher, indicating broad market strength and positive momentum.
